quotes: In a few years let’s see whether it works or not.

organizations.name: UN
quotes: I went to the UN and I found out all the procurement Timorese that were working there and I offered them jobs and matched their salaries or I gave a little bit extra, and then I got them all out of the UN and to me.

organizations.name: ADB
quotes: I got one from ADB. So, I am taking people out of the donors’ people into the government.

organizations.name: International Organizations
quotes: there is a struggle for the educated Timo rese happening between the government and the International Organizations in Timor?
But then the International Organizations pay them that.
